prompt: Cinematic food photography of Nasi Goreng Kampung Indonesia, served on a vintage ceramic plate. The fried rice is dark brown from sweet soy sauce, smoky, topped with a crispy lace egg (Telur Dadar Barendo) that is golden and oily. Sprinkled with fried shallots. Side of cucumber pickles and prawn crackers. Wooden table background, warm morning sunlight, steam rising, high resolution, photorealistic, 8k, delicious texture.

Close up shot of Bakso Malang Komplit in a ceramic bowl. Contains smooth meatballs, rough vein meatballs, fried wonton mawar (Bakwan Malang) being dipped in broth, steamed siomay, and tofu. Clear savory beef broth with celery and fried onions. Spicy chili sauce side. Spoon lifting a meatball. Authentic Indonesian street food vibe, sharp focus, vibrant colors, appetizing.

Premium Oxtail Soup (Sop Buntut) in a white luxury bowl. Large tender oxtail meat pieces falling off the bone, clear rich broth with floating oil droplets, carrot chunks, potato cubes, tomato slices. Garnished with fried shallots and celery. Melinjo crackers (Emping) on side. Fine dining plating, bright natural lighting, crystal clear details, 8k.

Top down view of Gado-Gado Betawi. A mix of boiled vegetables (spinach, long beans, corn), tofu, tempeh, and boiled egg, generously POURED with thick, textured, dark brown peanut sauce. Topped with red prawn crackers and Emping melinjo. Served on a traditional woven plate lined with banana leaf. Messy but delicious presentation, rich texture, cinematic lighting.

Mouthwatering Iga Bakar Madu (Honey Grilled Ribs). Large beef ribs grilled to perfection with shiny caramelized dark brown surface, glistering with honey and soy sauce glaze, slightly charred edges. Smoke tendrils. Served on a wooden board with sambal and fresh lime. Macro food photography, extreme detail on the meat fibers and glaze, warm mood.

Tongseng Kambing Solo in a bowl. Thick yellowish-brown curry-like broth with chunks of goat meat, fresh crunchy cabbage pieces, and tomato slices. Steam rising. Visible chili peppers whole. Served with warm white rice. Authentic Javanese cuisine, rustic wooden table, cozy atmosphere, appetizing colors.

Ayam Penyet Suroboyo style. Golden fried chicken smashed flat on a stone mortar (Cobek) covered in spicy red Sambal Korek (chili oil paste). Fresh basil leaves (kemangi), cucumber slices, and long beans on the side. The oil from sambal is glistening red hot. Intense spicy food photography, high contrast, dramatic lighting.

Sayur Asem Jakarta with cloudy reddish broth in a glass bowl. Visible ingredients: Corn on the cob pieces, Chayote, Long beans, Melinjo nuts, Jackfruit pieces, and Peanuts. Fresh, sour, and condensation on the bowl. Bright daylight setting, healthy traditional Indonesian soup, sharp focus.
